attributes.action: Save Greenock Custom House from closure by HMRC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have worked for Customs and Excise (now HMRC)for 27 years and first started in Custom House in 1981.I now work in Paisley but still regard the Custom House as a fine building which could be staffed properly and be viable. It already has specialist functions in the Gaming licence national centre, national alcohol intelligence centre and further new tobacco centralisation work could be sited there.So come on Gordon (and Alastair) as an ex chancellor get yourself down there and cut a ribbon on new work HMRC could put there and keep Greenock's long tradition with Customs alive - please !
